personalInfo.name: Yichuan Huang
personalInfo.title: AI Researcher | Robotics, Reinforcement Learning & Generative Models
personalInfo.quote: Building intelligent systems that bridge robotics, learning, and real-world deployment.
personalInfo.footerQuote: Research is turning curiosity into impact.

about.title: Electrical & Electronic Engineer
about.description: BEng student at the University of Nottingham, with strong foundations in embedded systems, control, and computation.

about.title: Robotics & RL Researcher
about.description: Focused on deep reinforcement learning for robotic manipulation and sim-to-sim generalization.

about.title: Generative AI Researcher
about.description: Proposed CUT-based virtual staining pipelines and explored diffusion models for biomedical imaging.

about.title: Kaggle Competitor
about.description: Four-time Kaggle Notebook Bronze Medalist with top 18% leaderboard performance.

currentFocus.title: Robotic Reinforcement Learning
currentFocus.description: SAC-based control for manipulation tasks in MuJoCo and Isaac Sim environments.

currentFocus.title: Generative Models for Biomedical Imaging
currentFocus.description: Virtual staining, diffusion models, and domain adaptation for microscopy data.

currentFocus.title: LLM Post-training
currentFocus.description: Data synthesis, continued pre-training, and mitigation of catastrophic forgetting.

currentFocus.title: Research-Oriented Career Path
currentFocus.description: Targeting PhD-level research in AI, robotics, and intelligent systems.

currentProjects.title: Autonomous Robotic Harvesting
currentProjects.description: Deep reinforcement learning framework for flower-picking robots in unstructured environments.

currentProjects.title: Franka Panda SAC Control
currentProjects.description: Soft Actor-Critic implementation in MuJoCo achieving high-precision pick-and-place.

currentProjects.title: CUT-based Virtual Staining
currentProjects.description: Generative pipeline outperforming CycleGAN in structural fidelity and color consistency.

currentProjects.title: LLM Post-training Analysis
currentProjects.description: Survey and experimentation with EntiGraph, MoFo, and open-source LLM inference workflows.

achievements.title: 4√ó Kaggle Bronze Medals
achievements.description: Awarded for high-quality notebooks and discussions

details: Supervised by Professor Keyou You, Department of Automation
Developing a deep reinforcement learning framework for autonomous robotic harvesting
Implemented Soft Actor-Critic (SAC) on Franka Panda in MuJoCo for pick-and-place tasks
Designing a custom 2-DOF robotic arm environment for sim-to-sim transfer studies

researchExperience.institution: Shenzhen Research Institute of Big Data
details: Supervised by Associate Professor Ruoyu Sun (CUHK Shenzhen)
Surveyed LLM post-training paradigms and continual learning strategies
Analyzed EntiGraph for synthetic continued pre-training and MoFo optimizer
Deployed GPT-OSS locally to explore open-source LLM inference workflows
Supervised by Professor Feng Xu and Associate Professor Bin Li
Proposed and implemented CUT-based virtual staining pipeline
Demonstrated superior performance over CycleGAN in fidelity and color consistency
Explored Stable Diffusion, FLUX, and other generative models for domain adaptation

researchExperience.institution: University of Science and Technology of China
details: Supervised by Professor Wei Sun (now Member of Technical Staff at OpenAI)
Explored CNN-based computer vision classification models
Implemented Deep Q-Networks for vision-based gaming environments
Applied multi-modal generative AI for vision understanding and retrieval
